pullrequest.title: Make collapsible button of relevant display plugins "flat"

content.raw: A question about that route \(having not worked with stylesheets before\): if a .config xml file has a stylesheet specified in it \(with properties for `collapsibleButton`, for example\), the change specifically for display plugins' collapsible buttons in style.qss would still affect them, right? \(that’s what I want; I am imagining that the resulting style is somehow the union of the stylesheets.\) Or would that stylesheet have to re-specify whatever property I add to style.qss?
content.html: A question about that route (having not worked with stylesheets before): if a .config xml file has a stylesheet specified in it (with properties for collapsibleButton, for example), the change specifically for display plugins' collapsible buttons in style.qss would still affect them, right? (that’s what I want; I am imagining that the resulting style is somehow the union of the stylesheets.) Or would that stylesheet have to re-specify whatever property I add to style.qss?
